races.name: Human
races.description: Humans are the most adaptable and ambitious people among the common races. Whatever drives them, humans are the innovators, the achievers, and the pioneers of the worlds.

features.name: Extra Language
features.description: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.

races.name: Elf
races.description: Elves are a magical people of otherworldly grace, living in the world but not entirely part of it.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

features.name: Fey Ancestry
features.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

features.name: Trance
features.description: You don't need to sleep. Instead, you meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Bold and hardy, dwarves are known as skilled warriors, miners, and workers of stone and metal.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

features.name: Dwarven Resilience
features.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

features.name: Stonecunning
features.description: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check.

races.name: Halfling
races.description: The diminutive halflings survive in a world full of larger creatures by avoiding notice or, barring that, avoiding offense.

features.name: Lucky
features.description: When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

features.name: Brave
features.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

features.name: Halfling Nimbleness
features.description: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

races.name: Dragonborn
races.description: Born of dragons, as their name proclaims, the dragonborn walk proudly through a world that greets them with fearful incomprehension.

features.name: Breath Weapon
features.description: You can use your action to exhale destructive energy. Your draconic ancestry determines the size, shape, and damage type of the exhalation.

features.name: Damage Resistance
features.description: You have resistance to the damage type associated with your draconic ancestry.

races.name: Gnome
races.description: A gnome's energy and enthusiasm for living shines through every inch of his or her tiny body.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

features.name: Gnome Cunning
features.description: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

races.name: Half-Elf
races.description: Half-elves combine what some say are the best qualities of their elf and human parents.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

features.name: Fey Ancestry
features.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

features.name: Two Skill Proficiencies
features.description: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

races.name: Half-Orc
races.description: Half-orcs' grayish pigmentation, sloping foreheads, jutting jaws, prominent teeth, and towering builds make their orcish heritage plain for all to see.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

features.name: Relentless Endurance
features.description: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

features.name: Savage Attacks
features.description: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

races.name: Tiefling
races.description: To be greeted with stares and whispers, to suffer violence and insult on the street, to see mistrust and fear in every eye: this is the lot of the tiefling.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

features.name: Hellish Resistance
features.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

features.name: Infernal Legacy
features.description: You know the thaumaturgy cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the hellish rebuke spell once per day. When you reach 5th level, you can also cast the darkness spell once per day.
